mapper.insert: insert into price_storage_material (id, template_id, material_type, material_code, spec_name, outside_diameter, inner_diameter, wall_thickness, warehouse_id, unit_price, remark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outsideDiameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerDiameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wallThickness,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update: update price_storage_material set template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_type = #{materialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_code = #{materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spec_name = #{specName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outside_diameter = #{outsideDiameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inner_diameter = #{innerDiameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wall_thickness = #{wallThickness,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, warehouse_id = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modifier = #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update price_storage_material set del_flag=1, last_modifier = #{lastModifier}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime} where template_id=#{templateId} and del_flag=0

update price_storage_material set template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_type = #{materialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_code = #{materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spec_name = #{specName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outside_diameter = #{outsideDiameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inner_diameter = #{innerDiameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wall_thickness = #{wallThickness,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, warehouse_id = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modifier = #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ps.* from price_storage_material ps, (SELECT pg.id from price_general_template pg LEFT JOIN price_contract_item pi on pi.template_id = pg.template_code LEFT JOIN price_contract_info con on con.contract_code = pi.contract_code where pi.contract_code = #{contractCode} and con.contract_state = '1' and pi.del_flag = 0 and pg.del_flag = 0 ) px where px.id = ps.template_id and ps.del_flag = 0
